LanguageData.DruFungus.label: Dried mushrooms
LanguageData.DruFungus.description: Dried mushrooms are a food product with a specific aroma and taste, obtained by drying fresh edible mushrooms. Dried mushrooms after preliminary soaking can be widely used in cooking, for example in soups, stews, solyanka, sauces, pie fillings, mushroom caviar.
LanguageData.DruFish.label: Dried salted fish
LanguageData.DruFish.description: The process consists of two stages: salting and drying. Salting is mandatory for a product without heat treatment: salt will destroy parasites, if there are any in the fish, and slow down the decomposition processes.
LanguageData.DruFishPlastic.label: Dried salted fish in packaging
LanguageData.DruFishPlastic.description: The process consists of three stages: salting, drying and packaging. Salting is mandatory for a product without heat treatment: salt will destroy parasites, if there are any in the fish, and slow down the decomposition processes. After packaging in plastic, it can be stored almost forever.
LanguageData.MealFishAndBeer.label: Beer with dried fish
LanguageData.MealFishAndBeer.description: Beer and fish seem to be made for each other.
LanguageData.Yzvae.label: Yzvae
LanguageData.Yzvae.description: Uzvar - Compote based on dried fruits, dried berries and dried fruits.
LanguageData.Druchips.label: Dried chips
LanguageData.Druchips.description: Dried chips are a snack food consisting of thin slices of potato.
LanguageData.DirtyEthanol.label: Dirty Ethanol
LanguageData.DirtyEthanol.description: Braga is an alcohol-containing drink obtained as a result of fermentation of sugar or other sugary substances and intended for subsequent distillation through homemade devices. A compound with many side effects.
LanguageData.Ethanol.label: Ethanol
LanguageData.Ethanol.description: Ethanol is an organic compound belonging to the class of monohydric alcohols. Under standard conditions, ethanol is a volatile, flammable, colorless, transparent liquid with a characteristic odor and a burning taste. Active ingredient in alcoholic beverages.
